name: Incident Reports
description: Collection of reports related to incidents.

dataset.name: Incident Status
dataset.query: SELECT code, description FROM prisons.incidentreporting_constant_status where code NOT IN ('DUPLICATE', 'NOT_REPORTABLE') order by sequence

dataset.name: Incident report summary
dataset.query:
SELECT id,
       report_reference,
       ctf.code                    as type,
       ctf.description             as type_description,
       status,
       cs.description as status_description,
       incident_date_and_time,
       reported_at,
       reported_by,
       title,
       r.description,
       location,
       modified_at,
       (select STRING_AGG(prisoner_number || ' (' || cr.description || ')',',')
        from prisons.incidentreporting_prisoner_involvement  pi join prisons.incidentreporting_constant_prisoner_role  cr on pi.prisoner_role = cr.code
        where pi.report_id = r.id) as prisoners_involved
FROM prisons.incidentreporting_report r
       join prisons.incidentreporting_constant_status cs on r.status = cs.code
       join prisons.incidentreporting_constant_type ct on r.type = ct.code
       join prisons.incidentreporting_constant_type_family ctf on ctf.code = ct.family_code
WHERE status NOT IN ('DUPLICATE', 'NOT_REPORTABLE')

dataset.name: Count of incidents per location per day
dataset.query:
SELECT cast(date_trunc('day', incident_date_and_time) as date) as start_date, to_char(min(incident_date_and_time), 'DD/MM/YYYY') as filter_date, location, ctf.code as type, ctf.description as type_description, count(*) num_of_incidents
FROM prisons.incidentreporting_report r join prisons.incidentreporting_constant_status cs on r.status = cs.code join prisons.incidentreporting_constant_type ct on r.type = ct.code join prisons.incidentreporting_constant_type_family ctf on ctf.code = ct.family_code WHERE status NOT IN ('DUPLICATE', 'NOT_REPORTABLE')
group by date_trunc('day', r.incident_date_and_time), r.location, ctf.code, ctf.description

dataset.name: Count of incidents per location per week
dataset.query:
SELECT cast(date_trunc('week', incident_date_and_time) as date) as start_date, to_char(min(incident_date_and_time), 'DD/MM/YYYY') as min_date, to_char(max(incident_date_and_time), 'DD/MM/YYYY') as max_date, location, ctf.code as type, ctf.description as type_description, count(*) num_of_incidents
FROM prisons.incidentreporting_report r join prisons.incidentreporting_constant_status cs on r.status = cs.code join prisons.incidentreporting_constant_type ct on r.type = ct.code join prisons.incidentreporting_constant_type_family ctf on ctf.code = ct.family_code WHERE status NOT IN ('DUPLICATE', 'NOT_REPORTABLE')
group by date_trunc('week', r.incident_date_and_time), r.location, ctf.code, ctf.description

dataset.name: Count of incidents per location per month
dataset.query:
SELECT cast(date_trunc('month', incident_date_and_time) as date) as start_date, to_char(min(incident_date_and_time), 'DD/MM/YYYY') as min_date, to_char(max(incident_date_and_time), 'DD/MM/YYYY') as max_date, location, ctf.code as type, ctf.description as type_description, count(*) num_of_incidents
FROM prisons.incidentreporting_report r join prisons.incidentreporting_constant_status cs on r.status = cs.code join prisons.incidentreporting_constant_type ct on r.type = ct.code join prisons.incidentreporting_constant_type_family ctf on ctf.code = ct.family_code WHERE status NOT IN ('DUPLICATE', 'NOT_REPORTABLE')
group by date_trunc('month', r.incident_date_and_time), r.location, ctf.code, ctf.description

dataset.name: Count of prisoner incidents by type per month
dataset.query:
select cast(date_trunc('month', incident_date_and_time) as date) as month_year,
       to_char(min(incident_date_and_time), 'DD/MM/YYYY')        as min_date,
       to_char(max(incident_date_and_time), 'DD/MM/YYYY')        as max_date,
       pi.prisoner_number,
       initcap(pi.first_name)                                    as first_name,
       initcap(pi.last_name)                                     as last_name,
       ctf.code as type,
       ctf.description                                               type_description,
       r.location,
       COUNT(distinct r.id)                               as num_of_incidents
from prisons.incidentreporting_prisoner_involvement  pi
         join prisons.incidentreporting_report r on r.id = pi.report_id
         join prisons.incidentreporting_constant_type ct on r.type = ct.code join prisons.incidentreporting_constant_type_family ctf on ctf.code = ct.family_code
WHERE status NOT IN ('DUPLICATE', 'NOT_REPORTABLE')
GROUP BY date_trunc('month', r.incident_date_and_time), pi.prisoner_number, pi.last_name, pi.first_name, ctf.code,
         ctf.description, r.location

dataset.name: Report of prisoner involvement in an incident
dataset.query:
select r.id, r.report_reference, r.location,ctf.code as type, ct.description type_description, r.status, cs.description status_description, r.incident_date_and_time, r.reported_by, initcap(pi.first_name) as first_name, initcap(pi.last_name) as last_name, pi.prisoner_number, pi.comment
from prisons.incidentreporting_prisoner_involvement  pi join prisons.incidentreporting_report r on r.id = pi.report_id
join prisons.incidentreporting_constant_status cs on r.status = cs.code join prisons.incidentreporting_constant_type ct on r.type = ct.code join prisons.incidentreporting_constant_type_family ctf on ctf.code = ct.family_code WHERE status NOT IN ('DUPLICATE', 'NOT_REPORTABLE')

dataset.name: Report of staff involvement in an incident
dataset.query:
select r.id, r.report_reference, r.location, ctf.code as type, ctf.description type_description, r.status, cs.description status_description, r.incident_date_and_time, r.reported_by, initcap(st.first_name) as first_name, initcap(st.last_name) as last_name, st.staff_username, st.comment, r.title, r.description from staff_involvement st join prisons.incidentreporting_report r on r.id = st.report_id
join prisons.incidentreporting_constant_status cs on r.status = cs.code join prisons.incidentreporting_constant_type ct on r.type = ct.code join prisons.incidentreporting_constant_type_family ctf on ctf.code = ct.family_code WHERE status NOT IN ('DUPLICATE', 'NOT_REPORTABLE')

dataset.name: Prisoner summary of incidents
dataset.query:
with latest_report_per_prisoner as (
    select distinct on (pi.prisoner_number)
        pi.prisoner_number,
        r.location as latest_location
    from prisons.incidentreporting_prisoner_involvement  pi
             join prisons.incidentreporting_report r on r.id = pi.report_id
    where r.status not in ('DUPLICATE', 'NOT_REPORTABLE')
    order by
        pi.prisoner_number,
        r.incident_date_and_time desc nulls last,
        r.reported_at desc nulls last,
        r.created_at desc nulls last,
        r.id desc
)
select
    pi.prisoner_number,
    initcap(pi.first_name)                                      as first_name,
    initcap(pi.last_name)                                       as last_name,
    lrp.latest_location                                         as location,
    sum(case when ctf.code = 'ASSAULT' then 1 else 0 end)       as assault_count,
    sum(case when ctf.code = 'SELF_HARM' then 1 else 0 end)     as self_harm_count,
    sum(case when ctf.code = 'FIND' then 1 else 0 end)          as finds_count,
    sum(case when ctf.code = 'DISORDER' then 1 else 0 end)      as disorder_count,
    sum(case when ctf.code = 'DRUGS' then 1 else 0 end)         as drugs_count,
    sum(case when ctf.code = 'MISCELLANEOUS' then 1 else 0 end) as misc_count,
    count(*)                                                    as total_incidents
from prisons.incidentreporting_prisoner_involvement  pi
         join prisons.incidentreporting_report r on r.id = pi.report_id
         join prisons.incidentreporting_constant_type ct on r.type = ct.code
         join prisons.incidentreporting_constant_type_family ctf on ctf.code = ct.family_code
         left join latest_report_per_prisoner lrp
                   on lrp.prisoner_number = pi.prisoner_number
where r.status not in ('DUPLICATE', 'NOT_REPORTABLE')
group by
    pi.last_name, pi.first_name, pi.prisoner_number,
    lrp.latest_location

dataset.name: Location / week
dataset.query:
select Cast(Date_trunc('week', created_at) AS DATE) as week,
       to_char(min(created_at), 'DD/MM/YYYY')       as min_date,
       to_char(max(created_at), 'DD/MM/YYYY')       as max_date,
       location,
       COALESCE(ct.description, 'All types')        as incident_type,
       COALESCE(ct.code, 'All')               as type,
       count(id)                                    as number_of_reports
from prisons.incidentreporting_report as r
         left join (select code, description
                    from constant_type) as ct
                   on r.type = ct.code
where source = 'DPS'
group by week, location, ROLLUP (ct.description, ct.code)

dataset.name: Location / month
dataset.query:
select Cast(Date_trunc('month', created_at) AS DATE) as month,
       to_char(min(created_at), 'DD/MM/YYYY')        as min_date,
       to_char(max(created_at), 'DD/MM/YYYY')        as max_date,
       location,
       COALESCE(ct.description, 'All types')         as incident_type,
       COALESCE(ct.code,        'All')               as type,
       count(id)                                     as number_of_reports
from prisons.incidentreporting_report as r
         left join (select code, description
                    from constant_type) as ct
                   on r.type = ct.code
where source = 'DPS'
group by month, location, ROLLUP (ct.description, ct.code)
